backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and CRUD operations for Facebook outreach entries with categories, interests, attachments, and owner tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent frontend and backend changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of each major frontend file.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test.md: Smoke test checklist for verifying Live deployment behavior, anonymous access, UI features, and backend health handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, theming, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation between Dashboard and Hook Library and setting up theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DaysSi: Dashboard card grouping entries by source and showing days since last post with color‑coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Follow: Displays today's follow‑up reminders with entry details and an edit button, or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Succes: Renders a bar chart showing groups ranked by count of successful engagements, with fallback text when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Winnin: Shows top posts with more than five comments, sorted by engagement, or a message when none qualify.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog for deleting an outreach entry using mutations and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Displays a table of outreach entries with details and actions, including edit and delete via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryCat: Defines craft category options and a helper to get their labels.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: A dialog form for creating or editing outreach entries, handling validation, image upload, notes, and mutations.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryFor: Contains validation helpers for URLs and non‑negative numeric fields.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryInt: Defines interest option labels and a helper to map TypeOfInterest values to display text.
frontend/src/components/entries/ImageUpl: Provides UI for selecting, previewing, replacing, or removing an image file within an entry form.
frontend/src/components/entries/response: Provides label and style mappings for ResponseStatus enum values.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Implements the main app layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenActor.ts: Creates an anonymous actor initialized with an admin token when present.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Creates a simple anonymous backend actor for unauthenticated access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorizedActor.ts: Determines auth mode and selects the appropriate backend actor across authenticated, admin-token, and anonymous states.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Fetches backend health status using the authorized actor with retry and short cache timing.
frontend/src/hooks/useHookTemplateLibrar: Provides queries and mutations for loading and saving hook templates via the authorized actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and exposing login state.
Defines mutations for creating, updating, deleting outreach entries and saving group notes with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreachQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching outreach entries, follow-ups, group summaries, and group notes using an authorized backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI, loading outreach data and backend health while handling errors and entry management.
frontend/src/pages/HookTemplateLibraryPa: Provides UI for editing, saving, and copying hook templates with backend health checks and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect canister-related and authorization errors and produce user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Implements robust clipboard copy functionality with modern and legacy fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Provides utilities for formatting dates for display, backend storage, and input fields.
frontend/src/utils/imageFile.ts: Validates image files, converts them to byte arrays, and creates preview URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, containers, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing features for planning and fixes.
